DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety , tolerability maximum tolerate dose BMS-63233/XL413 subject Refractory Hematologic Cancer
DOC.brief_title: A Study BMS-863233 Patients With Hematologic Cancer
DOC.criteria: AML current WHO diagnostic criterion , FAB type ( except APML ) , Refractory ALL , Accelerated/blast phase CML Refractory MDS total IPSS score 2 high ECOG performance status < = 2 Accessible treatment , PK sample collection require study followup Total Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN ALT , AST ≤ 3 x ULN Women pregnant breastfeeding Subjects Acute Promyelocytic leukemia disease CNS leukemia disease ) Hyperleukocytosis ( define peripheral WBC > 50,000/uL ) Treatment investigational agent indication within 30 day protocol enrollment Subjects history gastrointestinal disease Subjects le four week allogenic autologous stem cell transplant infusion
